room_title: Escape room "Buried Alive" by Epic Escape Game in Pikeville
review: Had so much fun being "buried alive"! Had a blast and staff was super nice! Check them out!

room_title: Escape room "Buried Alive" by Epic Escape Game in Pikeville
review: This was the most fun we've had in eastern KY in a long time. Did "buried alive" and will definitely be doing the other rooms soon, challenge was awesome and the staff was amazing!

room_title: Escape room "Buried Alive" by Epic Escape Game in Pikeville
review: Had so much fun!! we did the Buried Alive room and although it was creepy and had my adrenaline pumping, it’s still kid appropriate. the rooms are designed really nicely and everything fits together.

room_title: Escape room "Buried Alive" by Epic Escape Game in Pikeville
review: Can’t begin to express how much fun this was. We had a group of 4 that done Burried Alive. We were impressed with how everything was set up and the staff was amazing! It was our first time there but we will definitely be back!
